long_description: Arc'teryx Gamma LT pants are ideal for hiking, backpacking, guiding and climbing, or any other fast-paced backcountry adventure you endeavor. Made of lightweight nylon/spandex, the Arc'teryx Gamma LT pants provide fantastic freedom of movement, breathability and durability in mild weather. Laminated construction adds durability and cuts down on weight. Soft, chamois-lined front fly and inner waistband wick moisture; snap closure and webbing belt secure the fit. Comfortable gusseted crotch offers unhindered movement. Hand pockets and a pocket on the thigh feature laminated zippers.
short_description: Arc'teryx Gamma LT pants are ideal for hiking, backpacking, guiding and climbing, or any other fast-paced backcountry adventure you endeavor.
